 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְגַּר‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==(stone-)heap== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***throw together***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***mound***); — construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָֽׂהֲדוּתָא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎י‎</span> [[Gen.31.47|Gen 31:47]] (= Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּלעֵֿד‎</span>).
